channel.title: Spec altar

item.title: Spec altar
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

[quote=“sex-scape owner, post:1, topic:416824”] if(c.specAmount < 10.0){ [/quote]

Are you sure its supposed to be 10.0? A few server use 100’s, I’m just asking.

[quote=“sex-scape owner, post:1, topic:416824”][code]

                            c.sendMessage("You must wait at least 3 minutes!");

[/code][/quote]

Uhm, sorry, but that is listed nowhere, find a maybe existing “else” and delete it.

Read full topic

item.title: Spec altar
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

		case 4008:
			if(c.specAmount < 10.0){
            if (c.specRestore > 0) {
                c.specAmount = 10.0;
				c.startAnimation(645);
                c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
                c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored.");
				c.sendMessage("You can only do this every 3 minutes.");
            } else {
				c.sendMessage("You must wait at least 3 minutes!");
			}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You already have full special attack!");
			}
			break;

no matter what spec i am it always says “You must wait at least 3 minutes!”

unless im full and then it says other but it doesnt give me my spec back

Read full topic
